fullText: This deeply personal work from the 85-year-old playwright is a moving meditation on memory, identity and the Holocaust's devastating impact on European Jewish families.
dtliExcerpt: This deeply personal work from the 85-year-old playwright is a moving meditation on memory, identity and the Holocaust's devastating impact on European Jewish families.
